ADVER.name: ADVER
ADVER.initialDescription: There is a small leaflet here.

AXE.name: AXE
AXE.initialDescription: There is a bloody axe here.

BAGCO.name: BAGCO
BAGCO.initialDescription: An old leather bag, bulging with coins, is here.

BALLO.name: BALLO
BALLO.initialDescription: There is a very large and extremely heavy wicker basket with a cloth bag here. Inside the basket is a metal receptacle of some kind. Attached to the basket on the outside is a piece of wire.

BAR.name: BAR
BAR.initialDescription: There is a large platinum bar here.

BELL.name: BELL
BELL.initialDescription: There is a small brass bell here.
BELL.longDescription: Lying in a corner of the room is a small brass bell.

BLABE.name: BLABE
BLABE.initialDescription: There is a blue label here.
BLABE.text: !!!! FROBOZZ MAGIC BALLOON COMPANY !!!! Hello, Aviator! Instructions for use: To get into balloon, say 'Board' To leave balloon, say 'Disembark' To land, say 'Land' Warranty: No warranty is expressed or implied. You're on your own, sport! Good Luck.

BLAMP.name: BLAMP
BLAMP.initialDescription: There is a broken brass lantern here.

BLANT.name: BLANT
BLANT.initialDescription: There is a burned-out lantern here.
BLANT.longDescription: The deceased adventurer's useless lantern is here.

BLBK.name: BLBK
BLBK.initialDescription: There is a blue book here.

BONES.name: BONES
BONES.initialDescription: A skeleton, probably the remains of a luckless adventurer, lies here.

BOOK.name: BOOK
BOOK.initialDescription: There is a large black book here.
BOOK.longDescription: On the altar is a large black book, open to page 569.

BOTTL.name: BOTTL
BOTTL.initialDescription: A clear glass bottle is here.
BOTTL.longDescription: A bottle is sitting on the table.

BOTTLE.initialDescription: A clear glass bottle is here.

BRICK.name: BRICK
BRICK.initialDescription: There is a square brick here which feels like clay.

BUCKE.name: BUCKE
BUCKE.initialDescription: There is a wooden bucket here, 3 feet in diameter and 3 feet high.

BUOY.name: BUOY
BUOY.initialDescription: There is a red buoy here (probably a warning).

CAGE.name: CAGE
CAGE.initialDescription: There is a mangled cage here.

CANDL.name: CANDL
CANDL.longDescription: On the two ends of the altar are burning candles.

CARD.name: CARD
CARD.initialDescription: There is a card with writing on it here.
CARD.text: Warning: This room was constructed over very weak rock strata. Detonation of explosives in this room is strictly prohibited! Frobozz Magic Cave Company per M. Agrippa, foreman

CHALI.name: CHALI
CHALI.initialDescription: There is a silver chalice, intricately engraved, here.

COAL.name: COAL
COAL.initialDescription: There is a small heap of coal here.

COFFI.name: COFFI
COFFI.initialDescription: There is a solid-gold coffin, used for the burial of Ramses II, here.

COKES.name: COKES
COKES.initialDescription: Many empty Coke bottles are here. Alas, they can't hold water.
COKES.longDescription: There is a large pile of empty Coke bottles here, evidently produced by the implementers during their long struggle to win totally.

CROWN.name: CROWN
CROWN.longDescription: The excessively gaudy crown of Lord Dimwit Flathead is here.

DBALL.name: DBALL
DBALL.initialDescription: There is a balloon here, broken into pieces.

DBOAT.name: DBOAT
DBOAT.initialDescription: There is a pile of plastic here with a large hole in it.

DIAMO.name: DIAMO
DIAMO.initialDescription: There is an enormous diamond (perfectly cut) here.

ECAKE.name: ECAKE
ECAKE.initialDescription: There is a piece of cake here with the words 'Eat Me' on it.

FLASK.name: glass flask
FLASK.initialDescription: A stoppered glass flask with a skull-and-crossbones marking is here. The flask is filled with some clear liquid.

FOOD.name: FOOD
FOOD.initialDescription: A hot pepper sandwich is here.

FRONT-DOOR.name: door
FRONT-DOOR.description: The front door is boarded and you can't remove the boards.

FUSE.name: FUSE
FUSE.initialDescription: There is a coil of thin shiny wire here.

GARLI.name: GARLI
GARLI.initialDescription: There is a clove of garlic here.

GNOME.name: GNOME
GNOME.initialDescription: There is a nervous Volcano Gnome here.

GRAIL.name: GRAIL
GRAIL.initialDescription: There is an extremely valuable (perhaps original) grail here.

GRBK.name: GRBK
GRBK.initialDescription: There is a green book here.

GUANO.name: GUANO
GUANO.initialDescription: There is a hunk of bat guano here.

GUIDE.name: GUIDE
GUIDE.longDescription: Some guidebooks entitled 'Flood Control Dam #3' are on the reception desk.

GUNK.name: GUNK
GUNK.initialDescription: There is a small piece of vitreous slag here.

HEADS.name: HEADS
synonyms: HEAD POLE POLES PDL BKD TAA MARC IMPLE LOSER
HEADS.initialDescription: There are four heads here, mounted securely on poles.

HOOK1.name: HOOK1
HOOK1.initialDescription: There is a small hook attached to the rock here.

HOOK2.name: HOOK2
HOOK2.initialDescription: There is a small hook attached to the rock here.

HOUSE.name: house
HOUSE.description: The house is a beautiful colonial house which is painted white. It is clear that the owners must have been extremely wealthy.

IBOAT.name: IBOAT
IBOAT.initialDescription: There is a folded pile of plastic here which has a small valve attached.

ICE.name: ICE
ICE.initialDescription: A mass of ice fills the western half of the room.

IRBOX.name: iron box
IRBOX.initialDescription: There is a dented iron box here.

JADE.name: JADE
JADE.initialDescription: There is an exquisite jade figurine here.

KEYS.name: KEYS
KEYS.initialDescription: There is a set of skeleton keys here.

KNIFE.name: KNIFE
KNIFE.initialDescription: There is a nasty-looking knife lying here.
KNIFE.longDescription: On a table is a nasty-looking knife.

LABEL.name: LABEL
LABEL.initialDescription: There is a tan label here.

LAMP.name: LAMP
LAMP.initialDescription: There is a brass lantern (battery-powered) here.
LAMP.longDescription: A battery-powered brass lantern is on the trophy case.

LANTERN.name: lantern
LANTERN.initialDescription: There is a brass lantern (battery-powered) here.
LANTERN.longDescription: A battery-powered brass lantern is on the trophy case.

LCASE.name: LCASE
LCASE.initialDescription: There is a large case here, containing objects which you used to possess.

LEAVE.name: LEAVE
LEAVE.initialDescription: There is a pile of leaves on the ground.

LISTS.name: LISTS
LISTS.initialDescription: There is an enormous stack of line-printer paper here. It is barely readable.
LISTS.longDescription: There is a gigantic pile of line-printer output here. Although the paper once contained useful information, almost nothing can be distinguished now.
LISTS.text: The rest is, alas, unintelligible (as were the implementers).

MAILB.name: MAILB
MAILB.initialDescription: There is a small mailbox here.

MAT.name: mat
MAT.description: A rubber mat saying 'Welcome to Zork!' lies by the door.

MATCH.name: MATCH
MATCH.initialDescription: There is a matchbook whose cover says 'Visit Beautiful FCD#3' here.

NEST.name: nest
NEST.description: There is a nest here, containing a jewel-encrusted egg.

PAINT.name: PAINT
PAINT.initialDescription: A masterpiece by a neglected genius is here.
PAINT.longDescription: Fortunately, there is still one chance for you to be a vandal, for on the far wall is a work of unparalleled beauty.

PEARL.name: PEARL
PEARL.initialDescription: There is a pearl necklace here with hundreds of large pearls.

POOL.name: pool of sewage
POOL.initialDescription: The leak has submerged the depressed area in a pool of sewage.

POT.name: POT
POT.initialDescription: There is a pot of gold here.
POT.longDescription: At the end of the rainbow is a pot of gold.

PUBK.name: PUBK
PUBK.initialDescription: There is a purple book here.

PUMP.name: PUMP
PUMP.initialDescription: There is a small pump here.

RBOAT.name: RBOAT
RBOAT.initialDescription: There is an inflated boat here.

RBTLB.name: RBTLB
RBTLB.initialDescription: There is a green piece of paper here.
RBTLB.text: !!!! FROBOZZ MAGIC ROBOT COMPANY !!!! Hello, Master! I am a late-model robot, trained at MIT Tech to perform various simple household functions. Instructions for use: To activate me, use the following formula: >TELL ROBOT '' The quotation marks are required! Warranty: No warranty is expressed or implied. At your service!

RCAGE.name: RCAGE
RCAGE.initialDescription: There is an iron cage in the middle of the room.

RKNIF.name: RKNIF
RKNIF.initialDescription: There is a rusty knife here.
RKNIF.longDescription: Beside the skeleton is a rusty knife.

ROPE.name: ROPE
ROPE.initialDescription: There is a large coil of rope here.
ROPE.longDescription: A large coil of rope is lying in the corner.

RUBY.name: RUBY
RUBY.initialDescription: There is a moby ruby lying here.
RUBY.longDescription: On the floor lies a moby ruby.

SACK.initialDescription: There is an old leather bag here.

SAFFR.name: tin of rare spices
SAFFR.initialDescription: There is a tin of rare spices here.

SBAG.name: SBAG
SBAG.longDescription: On the table is an elongated brown sack, smelling of hot peppers.

SHOVE.name: SHOVE
SHOVE.initialDescription: There is a large shovel here.

SPHER.name: SPHER
SPHER.initialDescription: There is a beautiful crystal sphere here.

STAMP.name: STAMP
STAMP.initialDescription: There is a Flathead Commemorative stamp here.

STATU.name: STATU
STATU.initialDescription: There is a beautiful statue here.

STICK.name: STICK
STICK.initialDescription: There is a broken sharp stick here.
STICK.longDescription: A sharp stick, which appears to have been broken at one end, is here.

STILL.name: STILL
STILL.initialDescription: There is a vicious-looking stilletto here.

SWORD.name: SWORD
SWORD.initialDescription: There is an elvish sword here.
SWORD.longDescription: On hooks above the mantelpiece hangs an elvish sword of great antiquity.

TCASE.name: TCASE
TCASE.initialDescription: There is a trophy case here.

THIEF.name: THIEF
synonyms: ROBBE CROOK CRIME CRIMI BANDI GENT GENTL MAN SHADY THUG BAGMA MAFIA

TOMB.name: TOMB
TOMB.initialDescription: There is a tomb here, made of the finest marble, and large enough for four headless corpses. On one end is the cryptic inscription:
TOMB.text: Here lie the implementers, whose heads were placed on poles by the Keeper of the Dungeon for amazing untastefulness.

TORCH.name: TORCH
TORCH.initialDescription: There is an ivory torch here.
TORCH.longDescription: Sitting on the pedestal is a flaming torch, made of ivory.

TRAP-DOOR.name: trap door
TRAP-DOOR.description: A dusty trap door is here, obviously closed.

TRIDE.name: TRIDE
TRIDE.initialDescription: Neptune's own crystal trident is here.
TRIDE.longDescription: On the shore lies Neptune's own crystal trident.

TROPHY-CASE.name: trophy case
TROPHY-CASE.initialDescription: There is a trophy case here.

TRUNK.name: TRUNK
TRUNK.initialDescription: There is an old trunk here, bulging with assorted jewels.
TRUNK.longDescription: Lying half buried in the mud is an old trunk, bulging with jewels.

TUBE.name: TUBE
TUBE.initialDescription: There is an object which looks like a tube of toothpaste here.

WHBK.name: WHBK
WHBK.initialDescription: There is a white book here.

ZORKM.name: ZORKM
ZORKM.initialDescription: There is an engraved zorkmid coin here.
ZORKM.longDescription: On the floor is a gold zorkmid coin (a valuable collector's item).
